name: Mad Road 3D - Combat cars game
description:
In Mad Road the objective is destroy as many cars as you can.
Search and destroy the weaker car, or try to reach the finish to earn money to fix your car, buy spikes and nitros to stay alive in the next race.

-Records with Game Center.
-Spectacular 3D graphics.
-Graphics configurable to play fast at all iOS devices.
-Universal App: Resolution fits to any screen resolution.
-Multiplayer game via the local WiFi network.
